Name: Shredded
Description: Inflicted enemies have their defense decreased by 2 and take 2 DoT per stack. Caps at 5 stacks.

Name: Exposure
Description: Exposure increases the amount of damage a target takes. It can be specific to a damage type.

Name: Focused
Description: Focused enemies have twice the chance to be critically struck, but disallow other enemies from being critically struck.

Name: Graze
Description: Graze occurs when a projectile barely misses you. They have a cooldown of 2 seconds by default.

Name: Barrier
Description: Barrier reduces damage taken at a cost equal to the damage that would be taken otherwise. It recovers after not taking damage for a time.

Name: Starlight
Description: Starlight is consumed to activate abilities. It recovers slowly over time.

Name: Cursed
Description: Cursed items grant specialized bonuses in addition to a downside.

Name: Inoculation
Description: Inoculation reduces the amount of damage over time you take from debuffs.

Name: Reserve
Description: Life and mana can be reserved, disallowing you from regaining that amount. Your maximum life or mana still counts as its normal amount.

Name: Rend
Description: Rend permanently decreases defense by the specified amount.

Name: Debug
Description: Not intended for use in normal gameplay, and should only be obtainable via cheats or inventory editors. Please submit a bug report at https://github.com/ProjectStarlight/StarlightRiver/issues if you believe you recieved this item in error.
